item.text: It is actually reported that sexual immorality exists among you, the kind of immorality that is not permitted even among the Gentiles, so that someone is cohabiting with his father’s wife.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5448" class="">proud</st>!<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3756" class="">Shouldn’t</st> you have been <st data-num="3996">deeply sorrowful</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">instead</st> <st data-num="2443">and</st> <st data-num="142" class="">removed</st> the one who <st data-num="4238" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3319" class="">among</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>?

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3303" class="">even</st> though <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="548" class="">absent</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">physically</st>,<n id="1" /> I am <st data-num="3918" class="">present</st> in <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>. And I have <st data-num="2235" class="">already</st> <st data-num="2919" class="">judged</st> the one who <st data-num="2716" class="">did</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st>, <st data-num="5613" class="">just as</st> though I were <st data-num="3918" class="">present</st>.<n id="2" />

When <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="4863">gather together</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1699">I</st> am with you in <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="4862">along with</st> the <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>,
hand this man over to Satan for the destruction of the flesh, so that his spirit may be saved in the day of the Lord.
Your boasting is not good. Don’t you know that a little yeast affects the whole batch of dough?

<st data-num="1571">Clean out</st> the <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="106" class="">yeast</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> a <st data-num="3501" class="">new</st> <st data-num="5445" class="">batch of dough</st>—you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st>, <st data-num="2531">in fact</st>, <st data-num="106" class="">without yeast</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3957">Passover lamb</st>, has been <st data-num="2380" class="">sacrificed</st>.
So then, let us celebrate the festival, not with the old yeast, the yeast of vice and evil, but with the bread without yeast, the bread of sincerity and truth.
I wrote you in my letter not to associate with sexually immoral people.

<st data-num="3756 3843">In no way</st> did I mean the <st data-num="4205">immoral people</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="4123" class="">greedy</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">and</st> <st data-num="727" class="">swindlers</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1496" class="">idolaters</st>, <st data-num="1893" class="">since</st> you <st data-num="3784" class="">would</st> <st data-num="686" class="">then</st> have to <st data-num="1831">go out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="2889" class="">world</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> I am <st data-num="1125" class="">writing</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3361">not</st> to <st data-num="4874">associate with</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st> who <st data-num="3687" class="">calls</st> himself a <st data-num="80" class="">Christian</st><n id="1" /> who <st data-num="1510">is</st> <st data-num="4205">sexually immoral</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="4123" class="">greedy</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> an <st data-num="1496" class="">idolater</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="3060">verbally abusive</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="3183" class="">drunkard</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="727" class="">swindler</st>. Do <st data-num="3366">not even</st> <st data-num="4906">eat with</st> <st data-num="5108">such a person</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5101" class="">what</st> do <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> have to do with <st data-num="2919" class="">judging</st> those <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st>? Are <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3756">not</st> to <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> those <st data-num="2080" class="">inside</st>?
But God will judge those outside. Remove the evil person from among you.
